Regulation Name(s): Herpes Simplex Virus Nucleic Acid Amplification Assay
Specimen Container(s): Viral transport medium (Remel M4, Remel M4RT, Remel M5, Bartels VTM, BD UVT/Copan UTM)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AmpliVue® HSV 1+2 Assay for qualitative detection and differentiation of HSV-1 and HSV-2 DNA in lesion specimens using HDA and lateral-flow detection.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test to directly, qualitatively detect and differentiate HSV-1 and HSV-2 DNA in cutaneous or mucocutaneous lesion specimens from symptomatic patients; aids diagnosis of HSV infection.
